claim: MoE architecture maps to QA resonance blocks; MuonClip optimizer maps to QA Harmonic Gradient Descent

concepts.moe_expert: QA resonance block (one family of 24 tuples)

qa_interpretation.expert_i: QA family (Fibonacci, Lucas, Tribonacci, etc.) under mod-24

invariants: Per-tuple identities: d = b+e, a = d+e
Ellipse identities: quantum vs inner ellipse

failure_modes.description: Too many experts causes harmonic fragmentation
